Buddhism Pilgrimage Tour Spiritual and Ascetic Tour

To get the concord of mind body and soul the Pilgrimage Tour of India has been premeditated. India is a worldly country diverse people follow dissimilar religion. So accordingly there are ample series of Buddhist pilgrimage in India. It is in India where the enormous faiths like Hinduism, Sikhism, and Buddhism have been initiated. It is here in India where dissimilar religions subsist in synchronization. It's illustrious religiously has made it a regularly visited place by the religiously prone.

Buddhist tour in India provides visit to the Buddhist destinations that the country has to offer its guests. All the places are exclusive in their own way - sentiments of peace, synchronization, contentment are the established premise of all the cities. The Buddhist Travel in India comprises places like - Bodhgaya, Saranath, Varanasi, sravasti, Lumbini, Kushi Nagar, Vaishali, Nalanda, Rajgir, Dharmashala, Kapilavastu, and Kathmandu. There are lots of routs wrapping these places.

These consecrated sites are admired amongst the admirer of Buddhism and vacationers. There are four main Buddhist Pilgrimage Destinations which embrace Lumbini the birth place of Gautama Buddha, Bodhgaya the place of his illumination, Sarnath is the place where he conveyed his first philosophy and Kusinagar the place of his death. These four Buddhist hallowed sites are the most excellent places to sense the spiritualist charisma of Buddhist religion. The other renowned spiritual sites of Buddhism are Rumtek Monastery in Gangtok, Dharamshala in Himachal Pradesh, Sanchi in Madhya Pradesh and Ajanta Caves in Maharashtra. Buddhism India is the Mecca for all Buddhist devotees and to recognize the idea of Buddhism one must get on an expedition of Buddhist tours in India.

People of Maharashtra are pretty happy about the strong performance of Deccan Odyssey. The train is running to packed houses. And the change in its itinerary, it is expected to do the same for the upcoming season run.

During its journey of 8 days and 7 nights, the trains passes through Mumbai, Sindhudurg, Goa, Vasco, Kolhapur, Aurangabad Ajanta Caves, Ellora Caves and Nasik. The incredible rail journey on board Deccan Odyssey train lasts for 168 hours.

An informative guidance about the Taj Mahal Overnight Tour

Taj Mahal the symbol of unforgettable love attracts more than thousands of tourists to explore its beauty and unmatched architecture. It takes almost three hours from Delhi to cherish the beauty of Taj and Taj Mahal overnight offers you a chance to explore the beauty of white marble. So, let’s visit an enjoyable one nightTaj Mahal tour.
Day 01: Arrival Delhi/ Agra
Once you arrive in the capital city Delhi, our go heritage India journeys representatives will receive you to your most wonderful overnight Taj Mahal Tour. On your arrival you get enough time to explore the modern Delhi. Post lunch; you will proceed to Agra in a comfortable car. On the way you can enjoy seeing the beautiful scene of Indian Villages. In route you will visit Agra fort at sikandra built by Emperor Akbar. The fort is totally carved out in red sand stone and is perfect blend of Hindu and Mughal architecture.
On arrival, go heritage India journeys representatives will take you in hotel of your choice. In the evening, after refresh up set out to explore the beauty of Agra, unmatchable Taj Mahal and see the wonderful sunset. Seeing the Taj Mahal by this time will really please to your eye.
After Taj Mahal trip our representative will take you for the theme dinner, enjoy the dinner and proceed to the hotel for overnight stay.
Day 02: Agra depart to Delhi

Early morning after an amazing breakfast start out for Agra fort. A UNESCO World Heritage sites from where one can get the spectacular view of Taj Mahal. It looks great before sunrise and it gives pinkish glow as the first rays of the sun falls on it. Look in every nook and corner of the Taj to discover its hidden treasure. According to legends it is considered that Aurangzeb had kept his father under house arrest at this mausoleum from where the Emperor spent the last years of his life gazing at the tomb of his beloved. Really Taj Mahal itself cannot describe its beauty. After sightseeing in Agra drive back to Delhi to aboard a flight proceed to your respective destination.

Buddhist temples are known for the carving and effigies of Lord Buddha that are made up of loads of dissimilar materials. Paintings on the walls as well are so splendid that are worth exploring on a Buddha Tour. These temples are as well admirable for being the astounding examples of excellent architecture. Buddhist monasteries are moreover a pleasure to watch for the voyagers. These structures stand integral even after so many centuries of their building. Each Buddhist Monastery is enclosed by the striking natural beauty in the form of mountains and streams. Aficionados can attend the prayer sessions in the monasteries as one of the most amazing parts of a Buddhist Monasteries Tour.
Buddhist Monasteries Tour India takes voyagers to the country tour where Lord Buddha was born, lived, accomplished illumination, and died. Lumbini, the hometown of Buddha, Bodhgaya, the site of Buddha's enlightenment, Deer park, Sarnath, The Place where he gave his First Sermon, Kushinagar, Place of Passing Away are comprised in the this tour India. You can get lots of fixed departure special offers for Buddhist Pilgrimage Tour. Therefore, you should prepare yourself at-least once in lifetime to walk on the paths of Lord Buddha.

Golden Triangle Tour: Witness India with the Closest Proximi

Golden Triangle Tour is the most enthralling India tour that hauls millions of travelers from across the earth. It is certainly the most favored tourist path that wraps three most significant cities of India-Delhi, Agra and Jaipur. Each of the places of this tour transports the travelers to the golden epoch of Indian history, when the splendor and classiness of Indian culture was envied world-wide. Tourists on this tour get an opportunity to explore the history, culture and heritages of India in a short span of time of 3 nights/4 days Golden Triangle Tour. This tour voyage starts from Delhi and wraps Agra and Jaipur correspondingly. Let’s have a look at the tourist places of this well-known India tour.
Delhi: The capital of India, Delhi is the first destination of Golden Triangle Tours where the blend of old-world allure and modernity can be finest experienced. Delhi is a multi-racial city which has observed the rise and fall of lots of dynasties, realms and the British Raj in India and all of them have left their bang in the form of memorials and heritages. Chief tourist lures in Delhi are Qutub Minar, Red Fort, India Gate, Lotus Temple, Chandni Chowk, Connaught Place, Akshardham Temple and Humayun’s Tomb.
Agra: Agra is the most renowned tourist place not only in India, but as well in the world for here is positioned the most splendid majesty among the Seven Wonders of World-Taj Mahal. Besides Taj Mahal, the embodiment of everlasting love of Shah Jahan and Mumtaz Mahal, you can see in Agra ToursUNESCO World Heritage Sites in Agra, which is, Agra Fort and Fatehpur Sikri.
Jaipur: Jaipur, the Pink City of India, is the next spot of Golden Triangle Tour. It is the city of vivacious colors and traditions that draws travelers from far and near with its forts, palaces, heritage hotels, markets, gardens and other memorials. Main lures of Jaipur are Hawa Mahal, Amber Fort, City Palace, Jal Mahal, Jantar Mantar, and Albert Hall Museum etc.

Luxury train for Rajasthan tour-Not more than your expectati

Visiting Rajasthan through one of the luxury train of India can add extra enjoyment for you. There are many luxury trains running in various parts of India like Deccan Odyssey, The Indian Maharaja, and the golden Chariot, palace on wheel and Royal Rajasthan on Wheels Luxury Train. Luxurious facilities, comfortable bed, outstanding view from one of the window, health club and many more are features of these trains.
The Deccan odyssey train takes you on the excursion of South whereas the Indian Maharajas take you on a trip of North. Rajasthan on wheels Luxury train which is considered as the advance version of Palace on wheel. It was started in 2009 after the successful journey of Palace on wheel. These trains are not able to provide you world class amenities but also give you a warm hospitality. These trains are very popular amongst the travelers especially amongst the international tourists.
International tourists like to travel on these luxurious trains not only for the amenities but the traditional Indian hospitality these trains’ serves they found it great. All the trains are packed with modern amenities. They have very good option to dine and wine as they have restaurants that offers various cuisines and popular fine wine to their guests. Chefs of restaurant are professional and able to make all cuisines whatever a guest would like to eat such as Indian, Chinese, continental, Italian, Japanese and many more.
As far as cost is concern then each train charges different such as If you compare cost of Indian Maharajas to the Deccan Odyssey train then you will find it little different but not more.Royal Rajasthan on Wheels cost has been determined according to Palace on wheels and it run on same route. Luxury train for Rajasthan tour will cost you more but a week long that you travel on this train really leave you mesmerized and wonder.

The caravan of rejoicing festivals with Royal Rajasthan on w

Trains are one of the best convenient parts of transports system in the Indian Railways. In fact, the Indian Railway holds fourth position in the entire globe and also one of the largest organizations, having a number of employees. The state Rajasthan also a major international and domestic crowd puller, also a good railway network that connects to major cities like Udaipur, Jodhpur, Jaipur, Jaisalmer, Bikaner, Ajmer and many more. However, the best of Rajasthan train tour can be experienced on board luxury royal Rajasthan on Wheels in India.
Luxury Royal Rajasthan on Wheels
The most renowned name among luxury trains in India, The luxury royal Rajasthan on Wheels is really in no way less than a luxury heritage hotel. The hotel contains all the facilities and services whatever a five star hotel in country boasts. The Royal Rajasthan on wheels is thus another aspect of Rajasthan tourism and has their customer base mainly in the foreign tourists and the leisure tourists. In Fact, travel in Rajasthan these days contains tremendous scope for luxury tourism. Thanks to a number of palace turned hotels and the traditions of luxury services due to the existence of the royalty, Rajasthan is now a heaven of pleasure tourism and the royal Rajasthan on wheels is just added features of Rajasthan Tourism.
Tariff of Royal Rajasthan on Wheels
Charges of Rajasthan on wheel are determined on your family members. Children will be charged according to their age as special discounts are being offered by Rajasthan on Wheel. There are many things that is included in your tariff such as accommodation cost, entry fee for the monuments, forts, and palaces, meals and cultural entertainment or program. At the same time, there are many things that are not included in this tariff such as laundry, liquor, video camera and other personal items. We know the cost is little high but whatever you will get on this luxury train that will unmatchable.

Tariff Details of Palace on Wheels Depiction of Sovereigns

The Palace on Wheels is one of the best trains amongst the most royal trains in the world and provides an unending tour of the beautiful destinations of India, particularly historical and fabulous journey to Rajasthan in a royal grandeur. The Palace on Wheels tour doesn't charge you much in comparisons to services it provides to you.
We will offer you with complete details on the tariff, departure and payment or cancellation information for Royal Palace on Wheels Train.

Palace on Wheels Schedule
Palace on Wheels is a weekly departure train from September to April every year. It starts its journey at 4 pm from Delhi Safdarjung Railway Station.
Palace on Wheels Tariff depends on person’s age if you are travelling with your family and you have children then you can get Attractive discount at the charges. The charges of the train is categorized in various occupancy like single occupancy will be chargeable according to individuals choice, double occupancy chargeable on couple’s selection procedure and Triple occupancy will be chargeable as per the persons availability.

Tariff cover
Charges of visit and room, 3 time meals, group excursions & sightseeing tours in luxurious coaches, entry fee for majestic monuments and royal palaces and cultural program.

Tariff that is not included
No charges for Video Camera fee, wine, laundry and other things of personal nature.

Notes
1. Children between 5-12 years are charged 50%.
2. Children under 5 years are complimentary on full board, no additional bed.
3. NRI's can charge same rate in Indian Rupees
Payment Options
1. Credit Card
2. Debit Card
3. Bank Draft/Any other method, mutually acceptable

Cancellation procedure
15% of tour price will deduct if one can cancel beyond 60 days of departure date.
30% of tour will be deducted, canceled between 30 to 59 days.
No refund, canceled less than 30 days before departure.

Do experience a dream world on Palace on Wheel Train

The Palace on Wheel Train that is counted in top most luxurious train in the world, it passes through many destinations of India. The excursion of Rajasthan tour is one of the best tours of this train. This heritage train was built in mid of the 19 the century. After observing a lot of possibility of tourism the Indian Railways and Rajasthan tourism development corporation jointly launched this luxury train for the purpose of providing a unique memorable experience to the tourists visiting Rajasthan.
The Palace on Wheels Train has been beautifully decorated and it seems it is a dream world for every guests. It not only helps you in exploring the modernity, beautiful landscapes and adventurous dessert places of Rajasthan but also provide you luxury and comforts. The luxury train begins its journey from the capital of India Delhi and moves through various cities which are full of historical heritage and cultural rich like Jaipur, renowned as pink city of India. This city is also famous for producing precious gem stones, diamonds, royal carpets and many more things.
Another luxury train which is cover also heritage destination in Rajasthan is Royal Rajasthan on Wheels .One of the luxuries train in India with support of Rajasthan Tourism Development Corporation (RTDC),It cover Delhi >> jhodhpur >> Udaipur >> Chittorgarh >> Swai Madhopur >> Jaipur >> Khajuraho (M.P.) >> Varanasi >> Agra >>
The next stop will be taken by this amazing train at Jaisalmer which is famous for golden forts and sand dunes. This place has something that gives you mysterious feeling. Another stoppage of Jodhpur where you will come across with the majestic Mehrangarh fort makes you know more about this fort. During 7 night and 8 days journey the royal luxury train will take you on another destination that will be Udaipur adorned with marvelous lake palaces and then after taking little rest here it will move towards the city of mysterious forts Chittorgarh and wildness and nature grace place Sawai Madhopur. After the land of forts and monuments suddenly you will be served by the charm of wilderness of Bharatpur.
At the end you will be taken to see the symbol of love Taj Mahal, recently it is rated as world’s heritage sites. It is proud of India and every year more than thousands of people visit to Agra to see the Taj Mahal. Really, Shahjahan has made a wonderful monument in the memory of his beloved Mumtaj. Today, it is a great source of attraction for the tourists. Here, you can also see red stone of Fatehpur Sikri. And your journey will be end here. So if you want to travel inside the dream world of this luxurious train and experience the majestic state of Rajasthan.
